prompt: Create a modern About Us page with a clean white background and a centered app logo at the top, represented by a circular icon. Below the logo, display the company name 'InnovateTech' in bold, large text. Include a detailed company description in a paragraph format, explaining the mission to innovate and empower businesses. Add an 'Our Team' section with three team member cards arranged horizontally, each featuring a circular avatar, name, and job title. At the bottom, include a contact section with email and phone details in a bordered container. Use a Column layout with consistent 16px padding and spacing, and apply a professional blue color scheme.
